messages.title: How we can change the future together
messages.content: Control our borders, Invest in the NHS, Fairer tax system, Spend here, not abroad

messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, If elected, I shall put constituents before my party, working with colleagues to fight for Horsham. We need better access to the NHS and education & training fit for the future, to give local businesses the best chance of success. We need to return to local democracy, I shall be fighting for these objectives and to sustain the beauty and peace of Horsham and its surroundings. I want Parliament to regain control of our destiny, returning to government for the people.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day currently spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.
